short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A extension to count unread series in  MangaUpdates and sorts them accordingly

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension enhances the use of MangaUpdates. It adds a few sorting options to your reading list, highlights some Unread Chapter numbers and replaces the Welcome title with statistics about your reading list.
